content.title: Greetings Survivor!
content.text:
<TextStyle.Green>Welcome to Primal Kingdoms, the ultimate Ark: Ascended experience!</>

Explore, tame, and build in a family-friendly RP environment.

We encourage creativity, teamwork, and adventure. Make sure to check all tabs for important server info, events, and rules.

<TextStyle.Orange>Pro Tip:</> Use the 2, 3, or 4 Box layouts to see different types of information at a glance.

Stay active, respect others, and most importantly: have fun!

content.title: Rule #1
content.text: No griefing or harassment of other players. Play fair and respect the RP environment.

content.title: Rule #2
content.text: Keep chat PG. Avoid offensive language; this server is family-friendly.

content.title: Taming
content.text: Use the 5x Taming multiplier wisely. Focus on imprinting for max stats!

content.title: Building
content.text: Structures are capped at 10,500 in range. Plan large bases carefully.

content.title: Exploration
content.text: Ascended maps hide rare resources. Keep an eye out for hidden caves and loot!

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>Top Left: Server Info</>
content.text: <TextStyle.Yellow>Server runs 5x Harvesting, 5x Taming, and custom Ascended multipliers for balanced gameplay.</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Green>Top Right: Community</>
content.text: <TextStyle.Violet>Join our Discord to stay updated on events, RP storylines, and giveaways.</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Blue>Bottom Left: Events</>
content.text: <TextStyle.Red>Seasonal events and boss raids are regularly scheduled. Participate for exclusive rewards!</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Yellow>Bottom Right: Support</>
content.text: <TextStyle.White>Need help? Contact our admins in-game or on Discord. Weâ€™re here to assist!
